problem.p: What would be the value of the variable “result” after executing the following segment of code?

div.p: After executing the first two lines of the code segment, i will have a value of 10 and j a value of 25.
When executing the third line of the code segment, i's value is increased by 5 and the result is assigned back to i. Thus i becomes 15.
When executing the fourth line of the code segment, j’s value is divided by i’s value and the result is assigned back to j. That is, j = 25 / 15. Since it is an integer division, j becomes 1.
In the last line, the variable result is assigned the value of i + j, which is equal to 15 + 1 = 16.
